_sText:
This is by no means my first map.  However, it is the first map I would like to release to the public.  I know the map isn't that impressive, though I do hope someone will be able to enjoy this map.  I plan on releasing more grand maps later on, apon there completion.


Map Name:  De_BattleGrounds

Files Includes:  De_BattleGrounds.BSP, and De_BattleGrounds.NAV

Map Creator:  [AKA] ENIGMA (Me)

Map Description:  The basic mechanics of this map are stradegy.  I added barriers and walls which provide sufficent cover for the small map.  As usual the object for the Terrorists is to deliver the bomb, while the Counter-Terrorists try to prevent it.

Special Features:  There is, I promise, a hidden(invisible)teleporter.  The teleporter will take you one place, were there after you will have to find a second teleporter which will prevent your death and take you to the bomb-site.  Sorry for the not so detailed explaination, that is because it is up to you to figure out.

*Special Note*:  It would appreciated that no one copy/alter this map without my permission.  I may grant permission for alteration of this map, if you would like to reach me to dicuss this you can contact me at FpsBanana or with my email: Nickdon1017@gmail.com

Above all, enjoy the map.

**Installation**
1.  Take the cstrike folder and drag it into you Counter-Strike Source folder.  If it asks for you to overwrite folders, just say "yes" or "yes to all".

(DIRECTORY(Such as, C):\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\USERNAME\counter-strike source) <--Example.  Your counter-strike source folder may be found else-where.
